locations.title: Ainsworth 4 Corners Fuel
locations.content: Ainsworth 4 Corners Fuel may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
I wish we have a more NICE AND CLEAN truck stops like this one all over US.
Great people‚Äôs,huge parking and super clean showers!!! Nice view as well‚Ä¶
Wonderful staff, super clean, and plenty of hot food. Definitely a great place to stop! The owner personally greeted us and was happy to discuss the history with me! ‚Ä¶

IMPRESSED!! Plenty of truck parking and super quiet!! The store- wow on cleanliness - even bathrooms were super clean. staff was polite and friendly. Only thing I noticed was not allot of selection for coffee creamers - but always prepared had my own!! Great place!!
Very nice facility nice store with a great deli very clean restrooms are clean plenty of parking. They are open for 23 hours seven days a week. They close for one hour between 215 and 3:15 AM.
I'm actually leaving a review for a gas station stop. This place was amazing enough to make that effort. Rad everything. Good food, good bathrooms, good knick-knacks.

locations.title: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop
locations.content: Iowa 80 - The World's Largest Truckstop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I‚Äôve ever been to. There‚Äôs soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago

locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Great fuel stop and parking for commercial trucks, not so great for gasoline powered vehicles. This particular One9 doesn't have gas pumps, diesel only. Very clean store, and workers are friendly. Only reason I'm giving "four" stars and not "five", is because DEF dispenser is broken in lane eighteen.

Best Pilot(0NE9) ; met the coolest employees who came off more as friends. Observed for the entirety of 1 day (srsly) saw a ‚Äòstrive for five‚Äô cleaning every drop , tidy showers & even met the main. tech ; despite camping out for 2 days/slow ‚Ä¶

Actually like how the parking is laid out. Even though it's small, you still have plenty of room for backing. The staff was extremely nice and helpful. Everything was clean and very well maintained: the outside, inside and the ladies restroom.
Great job! üëç ‚Ä¶

Rating showers facilities, There were lots of used towels on the floor, the employee was walking on them without picking them up to place them in a basket, the same towels they gave you to use later, the showers were moisty, exhaust blowers ‚Ä¶

Second time parking visit here. Awesome truck stop plenty of truck parking 50 spots including paid  easy backing.  Friendly people staff management clean showers hot food etc.  Would highly recommend this Pilot en route i80 Iowa truckers

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ wifi than most TA‚Äôs The place is kept in good shape because of on the ball management. Water pressure is a bit low for showering, but still had a great shower üöø. Not a big lot for lots of trucks, but if you get in early, it‚Äôs worth the ‚Ä¶

Just came here to put fuel and to take a shower and for my surprise the private toilet in the shower room had not even been cleaned out or not even flushed. Disgusting to find the toilet full of üí© ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ run down, and poorly managed. The showers always smell disgusting, like, there is a certain specific nasty musty smell to a TA shower that if you put me in one eyes blindfolded I‚Äôd know I‚Äôm at a TA. The restrooms are always filthy. It‚Äôs ‚Ä¶

I got to shower here and it was very cleaned, no complaints there...the best. I wanted to get a quick bite and got me a chicken quesadilla and spicy chicken burrito. Love the quesadilla, but I was able to eat 1/2 of the burrito... I felt I ‚Ä¶

Driver don‚Äôt even exit this i80 exit 197 brooklyn TA I wanna take shower. I have a shower, but the lazy ass lady look like Indian. She say you don‚Äôt have shower I show her my app I have a shower she insult  me and I walk away. She‚Äôs a very ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ Cleanest laundry machines I've seen out on the road. Had to wait for a shower at 11am on a Friday but they are very clean as well. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ I had shop put new steer tires on truck, changed out thermostat and fix my A/C. I also took a shower and even visited the restaurant. I even washed laundry. This place is just very very nice people and very very clean. Corporate TA could ‚Ä¶

The showers are nasty!!!! That's all there really is to say about this place... Oh and the Pizza is way over cooked and greasy. I did manage to speak with a manager who did apologies for the service that we received and was extremely ‚Ä¶

Shower was filthy. Stubble left in the sink, shower floor all wet. Most places wipe it up before the next person. Then when I told the cashier about it, all she said she could notify the person. Most good places would have given me my ‚Ä¶
2 reasons - 1 star each - waitress very slow and not busy at all. Next, shower still had a lot of hair on floor and in the shower stall along with mold on the ceiling. I am normally not a complainer.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Yes, there's shower, and bathrooms are clean.
Plenty parking spots if you consider stay over night.
Only down side is the fuel price, it's not cheap and this location is not in my fuel card's net work.

‚Ä¶ deserve a raise for all they do! They are the most friendly group of overnighters I think I've ever encountered, all the while, making sure their store and shower areas are kept nice and clean. Thank you, beautiful ladies, for all that ‚Ä¶

Worst place to take a shower ever!!! The lady who took our money for the shower later called the police on us coz my man fell asleep in the parking lot and wouldn't straighten the truck out fast enough! Police said we could get a refund but ‚Ä¶

Have come here for the last 6 years. Normally not a bad stop, but this is the third time in a row that I've been told they don't have any showers clean. And each time they say it's going to be after 10:00 after the next shift comes in ‚Ä¶
Showers were clean, but no ac in driver's lounge or showers felt like 100 degrees up there. If you want a comfortable stay and shower. Don't stop here

Really inconvenient to stay there for any period of time and hope to shower after work. Only 2 showers and 1 staff on duty so if they get used they aren't cleaned till after next shift starts hours later.

showerReviews.reviewText:
Very neat and clean place.
Shower and laundry also available üëå ‚Ä¶

The shower room should have been cleaned. Shaved hair in the sink, toilet has bootie dust and hair along with something else. The side of toilet hadn't been cleaned in a pretty good while from the looks of it. There was a huge toenail on ‚Ä¶

Water temperature and pressure in the shower is great.
But hardly any water pressure in the sink, and water never even got warm in sink.
Makes shaving or washing face / hands un comfortable

This gas station has everything , bathrooms , food , souvenirs, clothes, they got electronics like gps, drinks
Shower
Everything that u need for the road

More than once have I had to get my paid shower room cleaned a second time.  This is unacceptable by far.  These are high traffic areas in which the customer is intimately interacting with this area. With a deadly virus going around we put ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Downside. The shower water smells like recycled sewage water that wasn't recycled. When I brought this to the attention of the staff all I was told was," We know." No apologizes. No refund for the noxious, gag inducing smell left covering ‚Ä¶
Big parking, clean shower, they have üç∫ also ‚Ä¶

Was told that I had to wait 45 minutes for a shower ‚Äúto let the water heat back up ‚Äú ? Maybe it‚Äôs true but I think just telling me that and letting me get into the shower room would be fine. Most of us shave ect before showering anyways. Al ‚Ä¶

This Loves is the best I've ever visited. When the shower bell rings, someone gets right to cleaning it. I did my laundry here and in that period, I watched several employees cleaning showers. Management seems to have a handle on the ‚Ä¶
If you want to use there shower. Strictly no because water stinks so bad even though all drinks stinks so bad. Be careful guys that would be dangerous for health and skin too
